Validate Weighting Function Implementation

Source: R/design_prior.R
validate_weighting_function.Rd

Tests that the weighting function parsing and computation in rctbp_power_analysis objects works correctly. This function validates both brms syntax parsing and R function handling, as well as the weighted power computation logic.

Usage

validate_weighting_function(effect_sizes = seq(0.2, 0.8, 0.1), verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

effect_sizes

Vector of effect sizes to test with (default: seq(0.2, 0.8, 0.1))

verbose

Whether to print detailed test results (default: TRUE)

Value

A list containing validation results:

  • all_tests_passed: Boolean indicating if all tests passed

  • test_results: List of individual test results

  • errors: Any errors encountered during testing

Details

This validation function tests:

  • Normal distribution parsing from brms syntax

  • Student-t distribution parsing from brms syntax

  • Custom R function validation

  • Weight normalization (ensures weights sum to 1)

  • Quantile computation for coverage checking

  • Error handling for invalid inputs
